trapomino

Class ErrorHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • trapomino.ErrorHandle

  • public class ErrorHandle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a BufferedWriter file to log any encountered errors into as well as all of the individual file handlers and formatters. Whenever a class requests to log an error to the ErrorLog.txt file, this class will write to it, then close the BufferedWriter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ErrorHandle

        public ErrorHandle()

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static void create()
        This method tries to create a BufferedWriter out of a file named "ErrorLog.txt". It also creates the log handlers and formatter.

      • writeTo

        public static void writeTo(java.lang.String text)
        This method writes the error text passed to it into the ErrorLog. It then moves to the next line, closes the BufferedWriter, and stops the game.
        Parameters:
        text - - the text describing the error to write into the error logging file

      • close

        public static void close()
        This method closes the BufferedWriter.
